com.registry

Class RegStringValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.registry.RegistryValue
      • com.registry.RegStringValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<RegistryValue>

    public class RegStringValue
extends RegistryValue

    This class represents a named value of type REG_SZ or REG_EXPAND_SZ. The type specific data for the value will be a String.

    Version:
    1.8
    Author:
    Yinon Michaeli
    See Also:
    RegistryValue, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.registry.RegistryValue

        key, name, type, typei, value

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getValue()
      Retrieves the type specific form of this value which is a String.
      int refreshData()
      This method is used to update the data for this value because the data does not update automatically if it was changed.
      int setValue(String value)
      Used to set the data of this value.
      String toString()
      Retrieve a String representation of this value.

      • Methods inherited from class com.registry.RegistryValue

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public String getValue()
        Retrieves the type specific form of this value which is a String.

        If the type was changed through a call to RegistryValue.setValueType(ValueType) and is no longer of type REG_SZ or REG_EXPAND_SZ, then a RegistryException is thrown.
        Returns:
        A String representing the data.
        Throws:
        RegistryException - if the type is not REG_SZ or REG_EXPAND_SZ.

      • setValue

        public int setValue(String value)
        Used to set the data of this value. If the type is no longer of type REG_SZ or REG_EXPAND_SZ, then a RegistryException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - A String representing the new data for the value.
        Returns:
        An integer error code which tells if the operation was successful or not. To obtain a description of the error, use RegistryKey.formatErrorMessage(int).
        Throws:
        RegistryException - if the type is not REG_SZ or REG_EXPAND_SZ.

      • refreshData

        public int refreshData()
        This method is used to update the data for this value because the data does not update automatically if it was changed.
        Specified by:
        refreshData in class RegistryValue
        Returns:
        An integer error code which tells if the operation was successful or not. To obtain a description of the error, use RegistryKey.formatErrorMessage(int).
        Throws:
        RegistryException - if the type is not REG_SZ or REG_EXPAND_SZ.
        Since:
        1.5

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Retrieve a String representation of this value.
        Overrides:
        toString in class RegistryValue
        Returns:
        A String representation for the value.
